name: nutriscan
description: AI-powered food recognition and nutrition tracking platform with comprehensive Pakistani food database

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: Masif Muhammad
